DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe three safe reproducible technique brow lift use botulinum toxin . It also describe effect three technique eyebrow shape use quantitative , objective measurement subjective scale .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Botulinum Toxin Brow Height Morphology : A Randomized Trial Systematic Literature Review
DOC.criteria: Consecutive 30 female patient present clinic brow lift botulinum toxin randomize receive one two injection technique Patients previous periorbital/forehead surgery Patients pluck upper eyebrow margin Patients eyebrow tatoos Patients upper face botulinum toxin injection past 12 month Patients resorbable upper face filler injection past 12 month Patients previous permanent upper face filler injection Pregnant patient Lactating patient Patients preexist neuromuscular condition ( myasthenia gravis , Eaton Lambert syndrome ) Patients use medication could potentiate effect botulinum ( ex : aminoglycoside antibiotic ) Patients sensitivity botulinum toxin human albumin
DOC.keyword: Botulinum Toxin , Rejuvenation , Brow lift , Eyebrow .
